interface:
contract interface ILQTYToken =
  record allowance_accounts = {from_account : address,for_account : address}
  record meta_info = {name : string,symbol : string,decimals : int}
  stateful entrypoint send_to_lqty_staking : (address, int) => unit
  entrypoint get_deployment_start_time : () => int
  entrypoint get_lp_rewards_entitlement : () => int
  entrypoint meta_info : () => ILQTYToken.meta_info
  entrypoint total_supply : () => int
  entrypoint balance : (address) => option(int)
  entrypoint allowance : (ILQTYToken.allowance_accounts) => option(int)
  stateful entrypoint transfer : (address, int) => unit
  stateful entrypoint create_allowance : (address, int) => unit
  stateful entrypoint transfer_allowance : (address, address, int) => unit

contract interface ICommunityIssuance =
  stateful entrypoint set_addresses : (address, address) => unit
  entrypoint issue_lqty : () => int
  stateful entrypoint send_lqty : (address, int) => unit

contract interface IActivePool =
  stateful entrypoint send_ae : (address, int) => unit
  stateful entrypoint send_ae_default_pool : (int) => unit
  payable entrypoint receive_ae : () => unit
  payable stateful entrypoint deposit_to : (address) => unit
  entrypoint get_ae : () => int
  entrypoint get_aeusd_debt : () => int
  stateful entrypoint increase_aeusd_debt : (int) => unit
  stateful entrypoint decrease_aeusd_debt : (int) => unit

contract interface IStabilityPool =
  stateful entrypoint set_addresses : (address, address, IActivePool, address, address, address, ICommunityIssuance) => unit
  stateful entrypoint provide_to_sp : (int, option(address)) => unit
  stateful entrypoint withdraw_from_sp : (int) => unit
  stateful entrypoint withdraw_ae_gain_to_trove : (option(address), option(address)) => unit
  stateful entrypoint register_front_end : (int) => unit
  stateful entrypoint offset : (int, int) => unit
  entrypoint get_ae : () => int
  entrypoint get_total_aeusd_deposits : () => int
  entrypoint get_depositor_ae_gain : (address) => int
  entrypoint get_depositor_lqty_gain : (address) => int
  entrypoint get_front_end_lqty_gain : (address) => int
  entrypoint get_compounded_aeusd_deposit : (address) => int
  entrypoint get_compounded_front_end_stake : (address) => int

contract interface ILQTYStaking =
  stateful entrypoint set_addresses : (address, address, address, address, address) => unit
  stateful entrypoint stake : (int) => unit
  stateful entrypoint unstake : (int) => unit
  stateful entrypoint increase_f_ae : (int) => unit
  stateful entrypoint increase_f_aeusd : (int) => unit
  entrypoint get_pending_ae_gain : (address) => int
  entrypoint get_pending_aeusd_gain : (address) => int

contract interface ILockupContractFactory =
  stateful entrypoint set_lqty_token_address : (address) => unit
  stateful entrypoint deploy_lockup_contract : (address, int) => unit
  entrypoint is_registered_lockup : (address) => bool




contract interface ITimestampOffsetForDebug =
  entrypoint increase_timestamp_offset : (int) => unit
  entrypoint get_timestamp_offset : () => int

main contract LQTYToken =
  record state = {community_issuance : ICommunityIssuance,lqty_staking : ILQTYStaking,lockup_contract_factory : ILockupContractFactory,bounty : address,multisig : address,balances : LQTYToken.balances,total_supply : int,allowances : LQTYToken.allowances,deployment_start_time : int,lp_rewards_entitlement : int,timestamp_offset_for_debug : option(ITimestampOffsetForDebug)}
  datatype event = CommunityIssuanceAddressSet(ICommunityIssuance) | LQTYStakingAddressSet(ILQTYStaking) | LockupContractFactoryAddressSet(ILockupContractFactory) | Transfer(address, address, int) | Allowance(address, address, int) | Burn(address, int) | Mint(address, int) | Swap(address, int)
  record allowance_accounts = {from_account : address,for_account : address}
  type balances = map(address, int)
  type allowances = map(LQTYToken.allowance_accounts, int)
  record meta_info = {name : string,symbol : string,decimals : int}
  entrypoint init : (ICommunityIssuance, ILQTYStaking, ILockupContractFactory, address, address, address) => LQTYToken.state
  entrypoint aex9_extensions : () => list(string)
  entrypoint meta_info : () => LQTYToken.meta_info
  entrypoint total_supply : () => int
  entrypoint get_deployment_start_time : () => int
  entrypoint get_lp_rewards_entitlement : () => int
  stateful entrypoint transfer : (address, int) => unit
  entrypoint allowance : (LQTYToken.allowance_accounts) => option(int)
  stateful entrypoint create_allowance : (address, int) => unit
  stateful entrypoint transfer_allowance : (address, address, int) => unit
  stateful entrypoint change_allowance : (address, int) => unit
  stateful entrypoint reset_allowance : (address) => unit
  stateful entrypoint send_to_lqty_staking : (address, int) => unit
  entrypoint balances : () => LQTYToken.balances
  entrypoint balance : (address) => option(int)
  stateful entrypoint set_timestamp_offset_for_debug : (ITimestampOffsetForDebug) => unit
  stateful entrypoint unprotected_mint : (address, int) => unit
  stateful entrypoint unprotected_burn : (address, int) => unit
  stateful entrypoint unprotected_send_to_pool : (address, address, int) => unit
  stateful entrypoint unprotected_return_from_pool : (address, address, int) => unit
